query:
SELECT name, atoll, 
  JSON_LENGTH(COALESCE(topThingsToDo, '[]')) as activity_count,
  JSON_LENGTH(COALESCE(foodCafes, '[]')) as food_count,
  JSON_LENGTH(COALESCE(faq, '[]')) as faq_count
FROM island_guides 
WHERE name IN ('Himmafushi', 'Fuvahmulah', 'Maafushi', 'Dhiffushi', 'Thoddoo')
AND published = 1
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3FFv3TtDUeNbYDM.root --database JUCCYykxYWxAcNny3wop55 --execute SELECT name, atoll, 
  JSON_LENGTH(COALESCE(topThingsToDo, '[]')) as activity_count,
  JSON_LENGTH(COALESCE(foodCafes, '[]')) as food_count,
  JSON_LENGTH(COALESCE(faq, '[]')) as faq_count
FROM island_guides 
WHERE name IN ('Himmafushi', 'Fuvahmulah', 'Maafushi', 'Dhiffushi', 'Thoddoo')
AND published = 1
